# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Office Furniture
=====================
### RFSO Information

| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2025 |
| Tender Status | CANCELLED |
| UNSPSC | 56101700 - Office Furniture |
| Procurement Category | Government of Canada |
| Notice Type | Request for Standing Offer |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Variations or combinations of the above methods |

### Important Administrator Information

* Department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* Contact Person: Sell, Nancy

### Tender Description

This RFSO solicits bids for the purchase of office furniture. The deadline for bid submissions has been modified, and all required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted on November 14, 2022, by 2:00 PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. 

A comprehensive list of trade agreements and free trade agreements has been outlined for commercial purposes.

### Schedule

* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
